verbs.description: Trump [V: could] be the first president to both be impeached and win a Nobel Prize .
[ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: the first president to both be impeached and win a Nobel Prize] .
Trump could be the first president to both [V: be] impeached and win a Nobel Prize .
Trump could be [ARG1: the first president] to both be [V: impeached] and win a Nobel Prize .
Trump could be [ARG0: the first president] to both be impeached and [V: win] [ARG1: a Nobel Prize] .
